# Twitter feeds should...

* Understand threads. 

* Markdown.

* You can use emoji short codes like :smile:

* Most important -- tweets can have titles since many feed readers expect them.

Imho that's a good first step in a bootstrap to integrate the Twitter and RSS worlds.

subs.text: 3/6 Turns out it was at a place I knew well, the Plaza Diner. When I was 17 I hitchhiked up to New Paltz every Friday and often would end up there on my way.

I unfollowed @Wirecutter because every time I go there I hit a paywall, even though I am a NYT subscriber.

cc @TwitterDev
